title: Plant Pathology 2020 - EDA + training (fastai2)
description: Plant Pathology 2020 with fastai2The goal of this notebook is to showcase some of the features in the soon to be released fastai2 library and to provide a starter example for classifying categories of foliar diseases in apple trees. Changelogv10 (2020-05-1) Bug fixes. Add test data to EDA.  v8,v9 (2020-03-15) Train 5 folds. Clean up some broken parts.  v7 (2020-03-13) Resize to 1024 Less oversampling.  v6 (2020-03-13) Label smoothing. Fix validation bug.  v5 (2020-03-13) Oversampling minority class.  v4 (2020-03-12) Add competition metric to learner output. Add confusion matrix.  v3. 2020-03-12 Bigger image size.  v2. 2020-03-12 First working version
